column5: Where is the best place to pick up live bait in ft. Frances? Maybe a flat of crawlers and some leeches. thanks
rainy lake sports in fort frances. They have a web site. Eric

Thanks. I'm fishing Holly Lake next week. My first trip- I'm a noobie. But we will keep very few for a meal or two and respect the resource. Of course we haven't caught them yet!!!!Taking plenty of grub just in case.
